next space between the double_crochet stitches from the row below this space is marked by the gold needle in the photo below 4 continue to double_crochet into each space between stiches of the row below try doing it by feel- find this space with your fingers instead of with your eyes great for crocheting in low light finishing a row crochet into the spaces between the stitches from the row below until you get to the last space this space is a little smaller than the others do not crochet into the last space between stiches of the row below you will skip this space it is marked by the
